```{r set-up-load-packages, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggrepel)
library(ggimage)
library(nflfastR)
options(scipen = 9999)
```

```{r load-pbp-data}
data <- readRDS(url('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/guga31bb/nflfastR-data/master/data/play_by_play_2019.rds'))
```

```{r eval-PIT-rbs}
pbp_rp <- data %>%
  filter(rush == 1 | pass == 1, !is.na(epa))

pbp_rp %>%
  filter(posteam == "PIT", rush == 1, rusher == "J.Conner") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = yards_gained)) %>%
  + geom_histogram(binwidth = 1)
```
